DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct determine overall analgesic efficacy safety fixed-dose ibuprofen 250 mg / acetaminophen 500 mg formulation compare placebo subject experience post operative pain follow surgical extraction 3 third molar teeth . A review report adverse event also complete .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Ibuprofen ( IBU ) 250mg/APAP 500mg In The Treatment Of Post-Surgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Males females 18 year 40 year age ( inclusive ) . 2 . Outpatients undergone surgical extraction 3 third molar , least 2 must partial complete bony mandibular impaction . 3 . Subject must least moderate pain 4 point categorical scale , confirm least 50 mm 100 mm VAS PSR scale within approximately 5 hour ( ie , less equal 5 hour , 15 minute ) surgery complete . 4 . In general good health contraindication study rescue medication . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Presence history significant hepatic , renal , endocrine , cardiovascular , neurological , psychiatric , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , hematologic , metabolic disorder determine Investigator place subject increase risk , include presence history within 2 year screen follow medical conditions/disorders : Gastrointestinal ulcer gastrointestinal bleeding ; Paralytic ileus gastrointestinal obstructive disorder ; Bleeding disorder . 2 . Hypersensitivity ibuprofen , naproxen , aspirin , NSAID ; APAP , tramadol , opioids , combination . 3 . Prior use type analgesic NSAID within five half life drug less take first dose investigational product , except pre anesthetic medication anesthesia procedure .
